name: SWG Armor Calculator
description: Comprehensive armor calculator with all armor types, stats, and crafting requirements. Includes damage calculations and resistance comparisons.
author: SWG Community
notes: Updated regularly with new armor types and balance changes

name: Advanced Combat Mechanics
description: In-depth guide covering all combat mechanics, weapon types, damage calculations, and advanced techniques for PvP and PvE.
author: CombatMaster
notes: Comprehensive guide with examples and calculations

name: Crafting Resource Tracker
description: Track all crafting resources, locations, spawn rates, and market prices. Includes resource maps and farming routes.
author: ResourceHunter

name: SWG Community Forum
description: Main community forum for SWG players. Discuss strategies, share builds, find groups, and stay updated on server events.
author: Community Team
notes: Official community forum with active moderation

name: Character Build Guide
description: Complete guide to character building including attribute optimization, skill trees, and build recommendations for all professions.
author: BuildMaster
notes: Updated with latest meta builds and strategies

name: Market Price Tracker
description: Real-time market price tracking for all items. Includes price history, trends, and market analysis tools.
author: MarketAnalyst
notes: Automatically updated with current market data

name: Group Finder
description: Find groups for heroics, raids, and other group content. Post availability and join existing groups.
author: Community Team
notes: Real-time group finding tool with Discord integration

name: SWG Wiki
description: Comprehensive wiki with game information, quest guides, item databases, and community-contributed content.
author: Wiki Team
notes: Community-maintained wiki with extensive game data

name: Quest Completion Guide
description: Step-by-step guides for all quests including prerequisites, rewards, and optimal completion strategies.
author: QuestHelper
notes: Comprehensive quest database with user contributions

name: Player Statistics Tracker
description: Track your character progress, achievements, and statistics. Compare with other players and set goals.
author: StatsTracker
